title: Designing Active Language Learning Environments for Corporate Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A practical language proficiency enhancement course for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields. Requires the establishment of a collaborative and discussion-based learning space utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform discipline-specific practical language tasks with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve project deliverables at least twice using a peer feedback system.
Learners can successfully conduct three or more group presentations using digital collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
